name: The Eggventure
description:
There was a story about an Egg that always trying to break free from all its limitations. Help it to accomplish its Eggventure, who knows what kind of beast this Egg will be!!. For now this game only has one chapter. Up to three chapters will be added in the Future!!

The Eggventure merupakan game yang dibuat untuk IGSI GameJam 2022 - Kategori Pelajar bertemakan "You Control the Environment, not the Player".

Click the Platform and then use WASD to Move.

Dāku Riyunionsu Team Member:

Muhammad Haikal Fisabilillah (Leader, Game Designer)

Muhammad Firmansyah Putra (Game Programmer)

Aldino Titteo Rikardo (Game Artist)
